name: openapi-boilerplate
description: Multi-file boilerplate for Open API Specification.

scripts.preview: npm run build && redoc-cli serve _build/openapi.yaml --options src/theme.json
scripts.html: npm run build && redoc-cli bundle _build/openapi.yaml  --output _build/index.html --options src/theme.json
scripts.generate: ./clean_out.sh out _build && npm run test && openapi-generator-cli generate -i _build/openapi.yaml -o out/client -g $QOVERY_CLIENT_LANGUAGE -a bearer --api-package api --package-name qovery --model-package  model --git-user-id qovery --git-repo-id qovery-client-$QOVERY_CLIENT_LANGUAGE
